result.title: Dijkstra 1 â€” sample code O(N^2 + M)
result.content:
#define N 111111
vector<pair<int, int> > g[N];
bool used[N];
int d[N];
int p[N];
void solve()
{
	int n, m;
	int s;
	cin >> n >> m >> s;
	REP(i, 0, m) {
		int a, b, c;
		cin >> a >> b >> c;
		g[a].push_back(MP(b, c));
		g[b].push_back(MP(a, c));
	}
	fill(d, d + n, inf);
	d[s] = 0;
	for (int step = 0; step < n; step++) {
		int v = 0;

		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)  {
			if (!used[i] && d[i] <= d[v])
				v = i;
		}
		
		if (d[v] == inf) break;

		used[v] = true;
		for (auto to : g[v]){
			//relaxation
			int u = to.first;
			int w = to.second;
			if (d[u] > d[v] + w) {
				d[u] = d[v] + w;
				p[u] = v;
			}
		}
	}



}
